constexpr std::add_lvalue_reference_t&lt;element_type&gt; operator*() const;

{{dcl | since=libfund_ts_2| num=2 | 1=
constexpr element_type* operator-&gt;() const noexcept;

{{tt|operator*}} and {{tt|operator-&gt;}} provide access to the object watched by {{c|*this}}.

The behavior of {{tt|operator*}} is undefined if {{c|get() {{==}} nullptr}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
1) Returns the object watched by {{c|*this}}, equivalent to {{c|*get()}}.

2) Returns a pointer to the object watched by {{c|*this}}, i.e. {{c|get()}}.

===Exceptions===
1) Throws nothing.
